title: Fort Foote Park: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions      Fort Foote is located on the Potomac River in Prince Georges County. From the Beltway (I-95), take exit 3, Indian Head Highway south (MD210) and drive for approximately 3.5 miles to Old Fort Road. Turn right for 1 mile to Fort Foote Road S, turn left. Follow the winding road through the residential area to entrance sight on the left for the fort. Fort Foote Park 8901 Fort Foote Road Fort Washington, MD  20744
